overview: An old picture book writer named Yamazaki (Taijiro TAMURA), having been handsome as a young gay man, grows narcissistic of his beauty. But now, can’t bear his own aging. One night, Yamazaki meets a young and beautiful man named Leo (Atomu MIZUISHI). Yamazaki collapses during an S&M session with Leo, and reveals his agony. But it’s lost on young Leo. Yamazaki turns to hurting himself in order to bear his own reflection in the mirror…. Having loved only himself, he falls in love with someone else for the first time. Through this love, he finally comes to terms with and begins to forge the relationships he failed to carve during his youth with his friends and family.
title: Old Narcissus
